title: How come my Rengar Q says it does 400 Damage

replies.body: you're not reading the invisible numbers that say (+800)
because combing a squishie does that, also there is the base 200 or what not and then empowered q can double with normal q, and empored like 30% more damage

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=gK1uwQ5E,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-12-08T09:24:05.170+0000)
>
> because combing a squishie does that, also there is the base 200 or what not and then empowered q can double with normal q, and empored like 30% more damage

Empowered is +50% of your AD plus the base 30-240 (depending on level) and the normal is 30-180 based on skill tier and 20% AD scaling and your base auto is added onto this, but when I have like 200 AD I swear it does like 1.2K true damage lol.

With 200 AD it should be first Q 200+30-240+50% of 200 and the second should be 200 plus 30-180 plus 20% of your AD plus the empowered Q increases your AD by 10% so it's +22% and 220 Dmg but listed that's 300+30-240 +200 then 220 plus 200x0.22 = like 40 so 300+200+40+220+ whatever ranked it's at of 30-180 and 30-240 -

760 base and like plus anywhere from 200-300 around level 14 with empowered then normal Q but it feels like it just instagibs them and does more damage than that plus that's before armor.
